name: landingpage
description: Bookmarks organizer as new tab - Chrome extension

scripts.build: tsc && vite build && npm run copy-files && node fix-paths.cjs
scripts.copy-files: cp manifest.json dist/ && cp -r icons dist/ && if [ -f dist/src/index.html ]; then mv dist/src/index.html dist/index.html && rm -rf dist/src; fi
